reviewText:
For once, a DVD that delivers on what it promises:

Amateurs...check.
Megabust...check.
All-natural...check.

Ignore the elevator music. Ignore the awful dancing. Ignore the awkward posing (these are real amateurs and none of them are particularly comfortable with themselves on camera). Hell, even try to ignore the low-quality video and often second-rate photography, despite the allegedly "outstanding camerawork."

Judge this DVD on its merits: Seven outstanding gargantuan-breasted babes (and one dog), show off what God gave them, in full-frontal glory.

If you have a fetish for huge natural breasts, as I do, this will be right up your alley. Keep that in mind, though...I can see where this wouldn't be a big hit with just any viewer.

These aren't Playmate types. Imagine instead the hottest chick in your hometown growing up, who had that phenomenal rack that you would have given up your mowing money for two summers to spot for just 30 seconds through a bedroom window from the sidewalk. THAT'S the type of girl who you'll see here. Not all of them have great faces, but those bodies...holy smokes, those bodies.

I'm not convinced that either the ages or the bust sizes given for each model are accurate, but that's also tertiary. Just keep focused on the women themselves and ask yourself, as I did, how in the Hell they grew breasts like this when the rest of their bodies stayed so diminutive. Amazing...or should I say "mammazing"?

Im ashamed of myself. Not just because I bought what I thought was gonna be porn, but because this was terrible. Its a bunch of big breasted mediocre to below mediocre looking women, taking off their clothes.. Well, their tops.. annnnnnnnnnnnnd thats it. I wasn't expecting super hot models or anything, and I was expecting the everyday looking nothing... Some of these ladies... Lllllyyyyyuck! And why is Co-eds in th title? They aren't in school, and they certainly don't have any sex with men (or women, or ANYTHING!) in this DVD.. This is not good at all. Dont buy.
These women resemble, say, that knockout receptionist at the insurance office, or your friend's hot cousin. Liked it a lot.
